statements: SELECT * FROM research_misconduct ORDER BY allegation_id DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, allegation_date FROM research_misconduct WHERE investigation_status='Pending';
SELECT allegation_id, investigator_name, allegation_date FROM research_misconduct WHERE allegation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT researcher_name, allegation_description FROM research_misconduct WHERE allegation_description ILIKE '%fabrication%';
SELECT * FROM research_misconduct WHERE investigation_status='Closed' ORDER BY allegation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_misconduct WHERE investigator_name = 'John Smith' ORDER BY allegation_date DESC;
SELECT allegation_id, researcher_name, allegation_description FROM research_misconduct WHERE allegation_date >= '2021-01-01' AND investigation_status = 'Pending';
SELECT DISTINCT researcher_name FROM research_misconduct WHERE allegation_description LIKE '%plagiarism%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_allegations, investigation_status FROM research_misconduct GROUP BY investigation_status HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT researcher_name, allegation_date FROM research_misconduct WHERE allegation_description <> '' ORDER BY researcher_name ASC, allegation_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM research_misconduct_allegations;
SELECT allegation_description, date_reported FROM research_misconduct_allegations WHERE institution_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_id, institution_id, allegation_description FROM research_misconduct_allegations WHERE allegation_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM research_investigations WHERE investigation_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM research_investigations WHERE findings IS NOT NULL ORDER BY investigation_end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_misconduct_allegations WHERE allegation_id = 1;
SELECT allegation_description, institution_id, researcher_id FROM research_misconduct_allegations WHERE researcher_id = 5;
SELECT allegation_id, institution_id, DATE_FORMAT(date_reported, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM research_misconduct_allegations WHERE institution_id = 3;

SELECT research_investigations.*, research_misconduct_allegations.allegation_description FROM research_investigations JOIN research_misconduct_allegations ON research_investigations.allegation_id = research_misconduct_allegations.allegation_id WHERE research_investigations.investigation_end_date < CURDATE();
SELECT institution_id, MAX(date_reported) AS latest_report_date FROM research_misconduct_allegations GROUP BY institution_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM research_institutions;
SELECT institution_name, institution_country FROM research_institutions;
SELECT institution_name, institution_address FROM research_institutions ORDER BY institution_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM research_misconduct WHERE investigation_id = 5;
SELECT investigator_name, investigator_email FROM investigators ORDER BY investigator_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_institutions;
SELECT institution_name, institution_address FROM research_institutions WHERE institution_country='USA';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_institutions FROM research_institutions;
SELECT * FROM research_institutions ORDER BY institution_name DESC;
SELECT misconduct_date, misconduct_description, investigator_name FROM research_misconduct JOIN investigators ON research_misconduct.investigator_id = investigators.investigator_id;
SELECT * FROM ResearchInstitutions;
SELECT institution_id, institution_name FROM ResearchInstitutions ORDER BY institution_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE department = 'Biology';
SELECT researcher_name, department FROM Researchers WHERE institution_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Investigations WHERE investigation_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM ResearchInstitutions;
SELECT institution_name, location FROM ResearchInstitutions ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, department, institution_name FROM Researchers JOIN ResearchInstitutions ON Researchers.institution_id = ResearchInstitutions.institution_id;
SELECT * FROM Allegations WHERE allegation_description LIKE '%misconduct%';

SELECT researcher_name, allegation_description, investigation_description FROM Researchers JOIN Allegations ON Researchers.researcher_id = Allegations.researcher_id JOIN Investigations ON Allegations.allegation_id = Investigations.allegation_id ORDER BY researcher_name ASC, allegation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ResearchInstitutions;
SELECT institution_name, institution_id FROM ResearchInstitutions ORDER BY institution_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE institution_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name, institution_name FROM Researchers JOIN ResearchInstitutions ON Researchers.institution_id = ResearchInstitutions.institution_id;
SELECT allegation_date, allegation_description FROM MisconductAllegations WHERE allegation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ResearchInstitutions;
SELECT institution_name, institution_id FROM ResearchInstitutions ORDER BY institution_name DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, institution_name FROM Researchers JOIN ResearchInstitutions ON Researchers.institution_id = ResearchInstitutions.institution_id;
SELECT DISTINCT institution_name FROM ResearchInstitutions;
SELECT investigator_name, investigation_date, investigation_outcome FROM Investigations ORDER BY investigation_date DESC;
